website_summaries.verdict: As seen on ABC's Shark Tank, this waterproof garbage bag straps across your seat and comes with 20 bag liners.
pros: Patented side clasps to secure liners
Conveniently stays open and closed when you want it to
Mesh side pouch and adjustable quick-clip strap
Can also line with grocery bags

customer_reviews.title: Great Crumb Catcher!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality trash container for road trips. I just found a helpful new use for it. My kids aren't allowed to eat away from the table because of crumbs, but with this product around their necks, transient munching is no longer a problem!
customer_reviews.author: Angela T. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this for my Tahoe
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this for my Tahoe. I put it at the arm rest facing back. They have added clips to the sides to hold the bags in. You could use grocery sacks too. It is the perfect size to saty out of the way of kids in the back seat and for me to still reach it. I have older kids that don't want a trash in their face when sitting in the back seat so this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: ASLAND

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Was a purchase worth reviewing because I'm especially liking this bag combo. I get the ultra clever car trash bag which I didn't know about until recently, plus the liners which makes the difference. Everything is working great, it's the right size, love the look, and the company has taken really good care of me throughout the order. Video attached for reference...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Trash Bin!
customer_reviews.text: I opted to use a trash bag as an insert. Great little bag love the design nice and sturdy!! It did come with reusable bags. It has nice little spot to put a water bottle. The picture shows the bottle in one side of the bag there is also another compartment on the other side. Mine doesn't have a strap is shown in the picture. But I do like the trash been quite well ! It would be great for small children when traveling. If one of them were to become ill on the trip, I know I could use this and nothing would be left in the car. Sorry if that's too much information
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Plymale

customer_reviews.title: REAL REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! It has a thick protective plastic sewed on the inside so cleaning up spills is super easy. Plus it came with a roll of plastic garbage bags that fit perfectly inside. Heavy duty car trash bag. Very good quality. I was honestly expecting something thin and flimsy. That is not what I got at all. Holds quite a bit of trash. I'm a mother of 2 and car junk adds up really fast. So glad I bought this, it had come in handy. I paid FULL price for this item. Didn't receive it for free or at a discount so this is a real review from an average stay at home soccer mom.
customer_reviews.author: BonBon

customer_reviews.title: Not very useful
customer_reviews.text: The idea of a covered trash bin in the truck is clever. But the execution leaves much to be desired. The sides collapse instead of staying rigid, the lid does not stay closed even though it has a magnet in the "latch," and it angles away from the seat so things fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the clips on the sides which hold the liner ...
customer_reviews.text: I have this wrapped around the center console in my Ford Explorer so it is centered between my two messes, er... I mean kids, seated in the back. I like the clips on the sides which hold the liner in place. It has a soft but sturdy rectangular design which would stand up on it's own. It also stands up a whole lot better to my kids randomly moving and careless feet than the usual plastic bag does. I wish there were a better mounting mechanism for keeping it in the center (have to readjust the strap every time we have to open the center console) but even with that small annoyance it is a keeper in our car.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: I also love that it actually comes with the trash bags
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Drive Bin XL for our van because our kids were always trashing it, and just having a plastic bag hanging on the back of the seat wasn't cutting it. Since having this, my kids are actually throwing their stuff away, and it has been so convenient for keeping the van clean! I also love that it actually comes with the trash bags!! It's very stylish looking, sturdy, and I love that it can turn into a cooler when you need it to! Would definitely purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Nice Trash Bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size of the bag and I like that it came with bags to go inside for the trash. My old one I had to make bags to fit it. This is larger and easier to use. So glad I found it because it helps keep the car a little neater. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sissy

customer_reviews.title: An item thought out for its user.
customer_reviews.text: Granted, its just a trash bin. But unlike other brands and types around, i like how it was thought out for the consumers. Extra velcro to secure the bottom of the bin, magnet top to cover up when needed, useful pockets... and the CLIPS. It really makes a huge difference when securing the plastic bags in place, and is very easy to attach/remove the bags. The XL is quite big, but is a great size for large cars like our Mazda cx-9.
customer_reviews.author: kajyuyo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size! Came with some liners, but you can use shopping bags or small trash bags in it. It fit in the front of my 2017 Honda Odyssey perfectly, but also has a strap so it can be hung in the front or back of a chair. It also came with some Velcro.
customer_reviews.author: James Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: After looking at many different products for my cross over, I chose the drive garbage bin. This bin came with built in tabs on the sides to ensure the bags would not fall into the bin. I also liked that the container has a strap you can conveniently hang on any location in your vehicle. I recommended this product to my mother and aunt and they both purchased the item since I liked mine so much. The customer service is also very good and they follow up to not only make sure you received their product, but are satisfied with it as well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sitler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I used to just use a plastic bag hanging on my gearshift but it was almost impossible to put anything in it while driving, since it would just fall closed. This stays open and it's easy to drop something in without looking down. Because of my work schedule, I eat a meal in my car 3 times every week, so this is well-tested. I hook the strap around the gear shift so it holds the bin snugly against the "hump" in the middle of my car, and I like that the plastic bag is held in place by the hooks to keep the bin clean. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: mainer104

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought the XL bin and it is bigger than I had expected. Nonetheless, it was a good purchase as it now allows us to centrally store trash or keep food/drink cool with ice packs. Normal grocery store bags work with this bag, and there are hooks on each side to help secure the trash bag. There are also side pockets to keep some items handy for the passengers. Update 9/12/2020: I found myself never really using this bag despite my many road trips. The lid does not stay closed and found it have been a poor design. It simply falls inward.
customer_reviews.author: Photographer | Tech Pro | Outdoor EnthusiastTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Nice little trash can
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my needs. The strap secured it nicely to my center console and it doesn't move around when the car turns. It's also easy to remove when needed. If anyone is interested for size purposes, the picture is of it in the back of my 2020 Hyundai Kona.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Placement
customer_reviews.text: Finally have found a container that will secure behind the console of my Honda CRV. It looks to be good quality, also. I placed the strap inside the lid of the console and was able to still close it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough
customer_reviews.text: This item looks nice, and is well made. If I were doing it again, I would look for something a bit deeper. As the container fills up, as it approaches the rim, you start to get some spillage if/when a crumpled piece of paper uncrumples. That limits the capacity of the container, and I find it a little shallow for my use. But that notwithstanding, it's doing the job it's supposed to. And the ladies in my life enjoy giving me grief about the pink straps. So there's that. The seller includes a quantity of plastic liner inserts. When they are gone, I plan to use grocery store bags, the ones you get instead of paper when you check out.
customer_reviews.author: R. Tompson

customer_reviews.title: Just give me a little respect , respect!!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say anything how much room it takes away from back setters yet that’s why it didn’t get started but I like the idea that know more bottles or trash 🗑 won’t be rolling around my accelerator foot while I’m trying to pull into traffic and the mess everyone wants too leave behind. Specially those you’re let take your car you would think if they want to use it again they should keep better than how they got it in the first place I always did and I always made sure they had more gas then when I borrowed it to show my appreciation. Starting to have second thoughts about lending mine out anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Gaige

customer_reviews.title: Not a great chocie!
customer_reviews.text: This product has been in my car since I bought it 7 months ago and I have rarely used it. I just took it out of the car and it is falling apart. I am extremely disappointed and will throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: CPDurham

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t change a thing!
customer_reviews.text: This little trash can is perfect! It replaced a previous style that kept turning over. I love that it hooks on the back of the seat to keep it from under foot. Also pleased with the hooks that hold the bags in place.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler K.

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't hold its shape
customer_reviews.text: I'm so bummed this product didn't hold up to the hype. It doesn't hold its shape and when the 'box' goes skewompus , the contents inside spill out. The lid doesn't work at all because the container is no longer a rectangle. Oh, and those liners? They don't stay in place either because the box shifts its shape. I don't have young kids so it's not being abused and I rarely have anyone in the back seat. I'm just disappointed in product and how it stands up. It's pretty much worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Smells toxic
customer_reviews.text: The thing would work fine as a garbage container but the material that lines it smells terrible and I haven’t wanted to put it in the car where it would fill the car with bad plastic chemical smell.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my wife and she is loving it. She had one of a different brand before and it lasted no time before it started ripping. So far, this one appears to be hold pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Chappy

customer_reviews.title: Strap Deteriorated
customer_reviews.text: The trash seemed pretty good. The size of it is great. However, less than five months of having it and the strap broke. The strap in places literally crumbled. I could take my finger and the strap fibers would just fall away. It’s not an expensive product, but I expected more than this. Wanted like this product, and for sometime I did. I will not be buying a replacement from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear #3

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had one of these for years. I used to have a smaller one but sadly it got lost in my car fire. So I upgraded to a bigger one and I really like it. It’s really handy to have in your car and it fits great in that spot Behind your middle console. It has little pockets on the sides and comes with velcro and bags for it. Overall a durable bag and I obviously loved it enough to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Lexy Zorotrian

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and size
customer_reviews.text: This has come in handy so often already. I have a tendency to eat in my car when I'm on the go and I love that I can reach over and throw my things in a designated area. It's definitely helped keep my car tidy. It comes with bags which I know I can reorder separately but if you use regular grocery bags those will do just fine as well. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie_X

customer_reviews.title: Would have loved, had no received broken
customer_reviews.text: I have have loved this bag if there wasn't a major piece broken on. The clasps on the side of the bag that are meant to keep in place is one of the main reasons I bought this bag. But one side is broken so it is pointless to only have it attached on one side. Would love if they would send a replacement piece to me as they are detachable from the bag itself. I have attached pictures of the broken piece and of the unbroken piece for comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Kenz

customer_reviews.title: awesome bin
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! I loop it aroubd the center console if my Corolla and keep the bin over the center hump in the back. The access is easy and it is big enough for my 2 kids in the back. My 9yo & 12yo will actually use this product and my back row is finally free of wrappers and whatnots!! If we have another kid in the middle, it's still easy enough to sit with legs on either side. I was afraid it might be too big, but it's perfect for us because a discarded cup/can won't immediately render it unusable. It is also super convenient to use grocery store plastic bags.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Platypus

customer_reviews.title: Useful but didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I had given this garbage 5 stars but after having it for a few months it hasn’t held up as well as we had hoped. The color is very sun faded which isn’t the end of the world but added with the fact that the snap broke after just a few weeks and we know have to tie it, we are just a little disappointed. That being said it’s a good concept and we still use it.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Schmerge

customer_reviews.title: garbage can
customer_reviews.text: Eh. It's really big. Was hoping it was smaller. Be sure to read the measurements. It comes with a small supply of plastic liners with handles. And it comes with about a 2" piece of hook and loop stickers if you want to go that route - eh. Other wise, you get to use the attached long strap - that is very difficult to adjust - and hook it under your center console boot - draping to the back seat area. Double Eh. I was hoping it would be better than it was. I'm not sure what type of vehicle this bag would work for as it's so big - I have a 2019 Lexus Rx450hL.
customer_reviews.author: ForeverYOUNGTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Update: I’m getting complaints from people who sit in the behind about leg room... overall, I’m still loving it but I guess it might be too big for people who are sitting in the backseat... Original post: Love love love! Because of COVID, I now always have disposable gloves and masks I need to throw away during or after a trip. Having this one is so handy and tidy! It looks really water resistant. I also love how it gives several bags for free. It also has hooks on the side to make sure the bag is secured. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Shandy

customer_reviews.title: Kind of useful for trash but design needs tweaking
customer_reviews.text: The strap fastener is plastic & broke over time. I used to swing this thing to the back of the passenger seat when someone was going to be sitting there, and it doesn't like to be moved. Also, the strap isn't designed to keep the bucket level so beware if you have mixed trash (like it wouldn't take a water bottle along with paper, for example, without some fooling around with the load as it would tip out) which kinda sucked when that happened as I was driving down the road. I no longer use this thing in my car, it just didn't make it that much easier to corral the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Cool Kelly

customer_reviews.title: If I order again, will I get the right one? (Yes--at least this time)
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I finally reordered this product,and it is exactly what I wanted. I was a little nervous about it, since they'd shipped the wrong item the last time (which is why I docked them a star). I got this for my husband's car, but now I'm thinking of getting one for mine. I really don't "hate" the DRIVE Bin XL. In fact, I still want a DRIVE Bin XL. I returned my order because, instead of receiving a single DRIVE Bin XL, I received a package of TWO regular DRIVE Bins. Unfortunately, the package was LABELED "DRIVE Bin XL." Now I'm not sure whether to take my chances and order it again after I get my refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kim in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, two things I don’t really like
customer_reviews.text: One of the nicer ones I saw, only downside is that it is a little hard to keep it completely open. Also, I really don’t like how the button snap to close the lid is on the inside of the container. I understand the idea behind it, for if it is going to be hung on a seat, but even so it is not simply to close it, you need to use both hands. Other than that it works perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Collin Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Well made, convenient accessory
customer_reviews.text: Secures quite well to the back of my passenger seat; love the ability to throw extra bags in the side pouch to easily replace when you come across a bin at a gas station or Dunkin Donuts to toss a full bag. Super convenient for disposing of garbage from the driver's seat to locate it there. A bit on the large side, so if you don't already have good legroom, the back seat passenger is going to feel it in their space (especially if the person riding shotgun likes to keep their seat back). If you don't use that seat a lot or have a vehicle with a large cabin, I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A

customer_reviews.title: Hard to consider a magnetic closure
customer_reviews.text: The magnet is actually on the inside of the container and is not functional with a bag in place, very poor design. If they used a stronger magnet and had it where you can latch it from the outside, I probably would of kept this. Also this is the size of a lunchbox so it wouldn't take much before its overflowing. As soon as I received this in the mail I packed it back up and shipped it back.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect garbage bag for most vehicles
customer_reviews.text: Cant think of any improvements... I have it sitting in front of my seat in my truck. It straddles the transmission hump well and the straps hold it in place.. Its big enough to hold any typical garbage even a whole bag of leftover lunch from a fast food place. Side storage pockets are nice for spare bags... Hooks are helpful to hold bag properly in place and bags are sturdy to prevent leaks. Entire thing is washable even if there was. Only problem is I have to search bag for any items that flew off my console when braking every few days.
customer_reviews.author: crazytekkieTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: This car trash can was definitely not what I was hoping for but I am honestly just going to make it work for now. It does not stay open on its own, folds in at the sides. Also, it hangs awkwardly on the back of the seat and the lid does not stay closed. The lid and magnetic closure are arranged in a way that makes it difficult to keep it closed. The size is nice and the material works well but I would definitely not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa KD

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I got one for myself a while ago and I loved it. A co-worker of mine saw it in my car while getting into their vehicle and saw how useful it was and asked if I could get her one for Christmas. I got it for her this time and she was super excited for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Pray

customer_reviews.title: Not functional
customer_reviews.text: As many have mentioned, the magnet is weak, the bag doesn't stay open, and the strap is on the wrong side so the lid doesn't open conveniently. I would have returned it, but I already glued stronger magnets on already. Then I realized the strap/lid issue and it was too late. I added a cardboard box inside to give it structure and added velcro strips to attach it to my passenger side floor area. So much customization I had to do to finally make it work for me. Buy something else!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi M.

customer_reviews.title: Stays put.
customer_reviews.text: I like this except it needs a frame of some kind. It's a little challenging to get bags on because sides are not stable. You get one side of a bag hooked easy enough but then the struggle to get the bag over the sides begins because as soon as you get it on one side the other sides change positions. Even after hooking both ends, getting the bag over the other sides is hard. I got this because I could anchor it to the console as I got a new car that has a hump so my old trash container which was hard sided did not anchor.
customer_reviews.author: Oldhide

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: The Drive trashcan is incredibly useful. I have it attached to the passenger seat headrest and it is easy to move from in front of the seat to behind the seat when I have a passenger. I like the fact that I can use plastic grocery bags when the complimentary bags run out. The workmanship and quality of construction is excellent. I am sure I will be able to use it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Collins

customer_reviews.title: I can see the floor of the backseat again!
customer_reviews.text: I have a young boy who notoriously throws everything on the floor. I had been using floppy reusable bags for backseat garbage but they wouldn’t stay open and he always seemed to miss the bag. I like that it’s bus so that my Son has a bigger target and I can easily reach back and find it to put my own garbage in. I am using the bags that came with it but love that it works with grocery bags too. I don’t utilize the lid or the strap I just set it in the ground in the middle of the backseat and it keeps its shape just fine. I would buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoorgirl

customer_reviews.title: The magnetic lid is so weak
customer_reviews.text: It has a few problems that I returned it immediately. 1) The magnetic lid is so weak to keep the door close 2) The lid keeps moving when it is open unless you manage to install the product completely horizontal by its strap. For example, when you adjust the seat angle it makes space from the lid and the box and it becomes rattled in front of passengers, because nothing fix the lid to its container. ------ Recommendation: It is not the product issue, but I think it is too big and occupied too much space, I rarely need to keep that much of trash in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Nikravan

customer_reviews.title: I could not be more pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this product as a litter basket hungover the headrest of the passenger seat so that I can reach it easily on the back of that seat. One of the problems of any trash bag presence is sliding into the bin, so the Clips on the outside of the building that secure a plastic grocery sack but its handles is an absolute plus. The extra large size is ideal for my needs. I also appreciate the webbing on the outside for holding a bottle of water or two in case I run out of water in the cup holders.
customer_reviews.author: Mochni (Hopi: Talking Bird)

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize I was purchasing the version without a lid. You can’t put your window down with this mounted to the back of the seat or it will blow trash around your car. I had to put it on the floor which kind of defeated the purpose of buying a car trash can. It also doesn’t hold it’s shape great and collapses in on itself.
customer_reviews.author: Ranger Reed

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it is, but definitely not "XL" in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Nice little trash bin, but XL is a bit of an overstatement here. I went with the XL over the regular figuring it would be large enough to really fit a good amount of garbage; however, it is basically the size I'd have expected the regular to be. A normal garbage bin for a car I would expect to be about what could fit in a plastic grocery store bag, and that is what fits in this. Again, it works, it is nice quality, but if you are looking for something "XL" I'd probably look at the dimensions and maybe go elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: J. W. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Amazing addition to our family van
customer_reviews.text: With three kiddos 6 and under we end up with a crazy amount of garbage in our van. I tried using grocery bags on the back of the driver seat which work for a while and then something catches them and a hole is made and things leak. This is a perfect solution! The bag keeps it's shape and is leak proof so garbage stays put until the bag is removed. The outside has clips to keep the bag attached so with the windows are open it doesn't fly away. The adjustable strap will fit pretty much any size chair. Truly amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: No more mess on the passenger side leg area
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great organizational tool for me to keep my 2009 Honda Civic SI Sedan clean. Fits great in the bump between the two sides of the back seat behind the center console. The one down side to this item is that my city just banned the standard plastic bags and so did the towns nearby I shop in! Talk about bad timing hah! But that's alright, I'm sure I'll find a spot to get these bags from and I already have what feels like an endless supply sitting in my trunk for when I change them out. If your car always gets messy, this thing is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Knots

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me, you're a big fan of those garbage 'graveyards' in the door of the car. But, let's be honest those are not REALLY for garbage and it looks really messy! My sister had one of these car garbage cans and I knew I needed one immediately! The price point is perfect and the quality is AMAZING. They even provide a bunch of garbage bags to get you started! Highly highly recommend for keeping your car looking clean.
customer_reviews.author: BestBadger

customer_reviews.title: I regret this purchase -
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these. One for my car, and one for my wife's car. This trashcan has a ton of amazing features. I was extremely glad that this had a lid. Nobody wants to look at garbage when they ride in the car. The lid is stitched on backwards. It doesnt shut! I figured mine was defective, but my wifes was the same way. As i read the reviews, I am seeing it is just a design flaw. WHY put a lid that doesnt shut?
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Yount

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It holds my trash and it comes with extra grocery bags. However, the only thing that really irks me is that the lid folds in the wrong direction. I was expecting it fold over the trash can to keep the trash contained, but it doesn’t. That being said, it’s fairly small and with all the hand wipes usage, especially during this COVID pandemic, the trash gets full quickly and then doesn’t really stay in the trash can. I kind of regret my purchase and wish I got another style now.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Fits underneath center console vents
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new car to help prevent trash from being thrown on the floor. I love it! Perfect size. Not too small but not huge. I place it in the center of the backseat behind the center console. And it fits underneath the vents! That was one thing I was worried about. It can be reached from either front seat and it doesn't block two of the backseats. Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kalen

customer_reviews.title: Not that great...
customer_reviews.text: It's just not worth the money. I thought it would be a bit more sturdy and hold more. I returned this. It falls over easily. I can see where it wouldn't be too bad if you have a place to attach the strap.
customer_reviews.author: 3 Sisters

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Useful.
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as advertises. Too big for us to mount in the front seat of our F150 with bucket seats and center console, but we knew that going in. We hung it from the driver's seat headrest and it works great. Just the right capacity for the two of us on a road trip or just around town. Once the provided liners are used up, plastic bags from the store will work perfectly fine. All in all, a good product in design, use and cost. Recommend for those needing a place for the "trash".
customer_reviews.author: Bill R

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Another cheaply made car trash container. Does not hold its shape well nor does it keep the bags in place that easily. That having been said, I did not return it and am still using it as something is better than nothing. Also, the lid does not secure and folds the wrong way. Only giving it the extra star because I did not return it
customer_reviews.author: Robert M

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: Where has this thing been all my driving life? My last car wouldn't have looked as messy as it did if I would have purchased this sooner. This is large enough to hold at least a half eaten breakfast from Starbucks including a venti cup. It isn't too big that the person in the backseat feels like they have has a garbage bin under their nose. The fact that it came with spare garbage bags was a bonus!! VERY easy to install and move from seat to seat if necessary! It still leaves your car looking as stylish as it did before you bought it! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Leesa

customer_reviews.title: BIG and great re-use for shopping bags
customer_reviews.text: This exactly as it says—XL. I drive a sports car with a small back seat that is almost never used for passengers. If I had two folks in the back, this would have to be tossed into the trunk. I appreciate the size typically, though and like the fact I can use a shopping bag to line it and LOVE the fact that the bags’ handles clip on the side so they stay in. I have not used the included Velcro to keep this on the floor as it works well for me strapped to the bag of the passenger seat.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Polen

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product! Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. This product exceeded my expectations. I bought it to use as a trashcan in my SUV. I loved the fact that it could be hung. I didn't want to take up floor cargo space in my SUV. I hang it on the second row seat. Our kids play sports and we do alot of traveling in the car. I wanted a WELL MADE, leak proof, affordable product to throw trash in. It was also important for me to find a product that LOOKED good hanging from my leather seats. Neat and clean car enthusiasts still survive with kids. So it is perfect. Note, the LINERS that come with it are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Elizabeth Watts

customer_reviews.title: Keeps trash off the floor
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is a fabulous must have! It has saved me from having to. Lean trash out of my car. We hang it on the back of the headrestand the kids have to troublereaching it. I just gave mine away to a cousin with 2 children when she was home and Immediately purchased another. I recommend them to my friends & family.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Liked very much till strap broke
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for almost 4 months. The size is fine and I love that it comes with all the extra bags. It doesn’t get any abuse (we don’t have pets or kids), but the buckle just detached from one of the straps. My husband repaired it with a zip tie, but this really shouldn’t have happened. Also, I mostly use it for Kleenex and small food wrappers, but it really isn’t big enough for lots of coffee cups, takeout containers, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff & Wife

customer_reviews.title: Side hooks broke the first time I changed the bag. No lid. Meh.
customer_reviews.text: The side hooks that keep the bags in place broke the FIRST time I changed the bag. Also, the clip is made for hanging over the head rest; I wanted to sling this between the bucket seats in my SUV. I had to get more webbing and clasps to make it usable. It also would have been better with a flip-top lid. Glad I got this as a Lightning deal. If I had paid full price... :-(
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good concept, cheap bag hooks.
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect sized trash bin for our 2017 Toyota Sienna. It fits right between the center stack on the dash and the center console (where the cup holders are). My only issue/complaint about this product is the fact that one of the little hooks on the side broke off pretty early on. These hooks that hold the trash bags are made out of a pretty cheap plastic. Either that or the one I got was defective. The trash bin still works fine other than that side not holding the bags as well.
customer_reviews.author: LowShack

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for car trash!
customer_reviews.text: This was a solution for containing our car trash. We kept slipping plastic grocery bags over the back of our armrest and they were tearing as they hung too low for feet to get around. This holds the bags in place and is sturdy! The only reason I give it 4 stars is that it fills up too quickly and the empty drink cups soon pop out because it isn't very tall. Still, my husband asked me to order one for his car, too!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie325

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Got this because storage space is such a premium in my new Honda Fit. It's sturdier than expected -- soft-sided, but it stays open. I shortened the strap and hung it behind the center console, with the strap running under the console lid. It actually sits on the floor, and the strap just keeps it upright. My old car had a purse hook in the front passenger seat that I would use to hang up a plastic bag for trash, and I thought I would miss having it in the front -- but I don't! I like it being out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Tolana

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Main thing that makes this hard to work with is the fact that it wont stay square. The collapsible nature of this make the sides fold in unless it is stuffed full of garbage. Also the lid’s snap is on the inside so its never able to be snapped shut. Even when empty it takes a few minutes to snap it. Otherwise, its a soft sided cooler with a garbage bag in it. Nothing to get thrilled about.
customer_reviews.author: Lysne

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, needs better execution
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s really cute, and my kiddo loves having a trash can in the back seat. I was surprised that the liners didn’t come in some sort of pouch that would easily dispense them one at a time. They are just stacked and folded, so that’s kind of a pain and makes it unlikely for me to order a refill of bags; I’ll just use plastic shopping bags. I’m also not in love with how it attaches to my console, but I would imagine that the design needed to be really flexible since it’s meant for use in any vehicle. Overall, I’m pleased with the purchase, but I won’t be ordering more for our family’s other vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: bigger then expected
customer_reviews.text: A lot more sturdy then expected. Lots of room for trash which is nice the last one i had wasn't very big this one is perfect for my van and our road trips. The bags are thin but not easily torn so that helps hold in more liquid so less to clean off of the bag its self. I can't get over the size I want one for all my cars
customer_reviews.author: Heather Long

customer_reviews.title: This is really cool!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! IT is about the same size as a larger lunch box, and is actually completely collapsible to store under the seat when needed. I keep it on the passenger floorboard, but the straps are semi needed. I had a close call with a driver moving into the same lane as I and almost ran me off the road so the bin tipped over spilling it's contents. I consider it a one off, but if you are not as chicken of a driver as I am, it may be best to have this bin on your seat and strapped to it as shown in one of the images for this item.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous01

customer_reviews.title: Good solid bag, perfect for grocery sacks
customer_reviews.text: Great trash bag holder. Plastic grocery sacks fit perfectly in it and there are clips to hold them in place. In fact it comes with twenty bags, and they are grocery sacks. Not much else to say, it is thick and sturdy and stands up on it's own but of course you want to use the strap to keep it from falling over around corners. It comes with a small patch of sticky velcro for holding it against the center console, but it isn't enough to hang it from, just to keep it from falling over as it sits on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: fantastic him, not recommended for reckless drivers
customer_reviews.text: it’s a perfect size, easy to clean and install, straps are adjustable so you can put it in a variety of places and it will fit in any car. the only thing i don’t like is the magnet holding the top closed isn’t very strong and takes some fiddling to get to work. this isn’t really an issue normally bc the lid will stay down on its own, but i imagine if you do some wacky stunts or goofy turns it could fly open and spill some trash.
customer_reviews.author: toast

customer_reviews.title: A car saver!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bin. It has saved my car from so much mess. It hooks easily on the gear stick and sits nicely in the passenger well without interfering with their legs. I love that it comes with a roll of plastic bag liners. It is easy to unhook and empty if you need to, or just lift out the plastic liner. I have even thrown half-finished drinks in there and had no spills. This does not move from my car now!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Trash can holds the trash efficiently
customer_reviews.text: So, it holds the trash. I wish it had a velcro system or something on the bottom of the trash can to hold it to the carpet of the van. The strap is pretty much useless because there really is no where to strap it in the back of our 2018 Chrysler Pacifica. The strap is too short to go around the console.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our little camper (Roadtrek) to hang on back ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our little camper (Roadtrek) to hang on back of drivers seat where more easily accessible while in transit. It was very easy to adjust and I like that it is virtually waterproof so I don't have to worry much about "spills." Our "Aussie" rides on the seat behind it layed down placing her nose right at where I place it so I'm hoping she doesn't find it too accessible. She's a good girl though, I don't think she'll bother it anymore than the trash can on the floor beneath her seat which I couldn't reach to throw something away from my passenger seat while in my seatbelt. Thanks Drive Auto Products, this really fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: TrytoBuySmart

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to keep your car heat
customer_reviews.text: Leg room? Not sure what they mean since this hangs from the head rest of the passenger seat. I NEEDED this item! I always tend to have a lot of trash-gum wrappers, water bottles, receipts. I’ve since started using a reusable bottle for water but this little garbage container helps keep my car nice and neat. It’s simple to remove if there’s a passenger, as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Jane

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vehicle trash bin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim since I feel like my toddler and I live in our van. I really appreciate that it doubles as a cooler. It comes with a set of the brand’s own bags, but it will work with any plastic grocery bag. It is easy to clean and I think it’s a nice size for any vehicle. Keep in mind the top stays open and doesn’t have a way of closing which I like, but might be a deal breaker for some. I have mine hanging on the back of the passengers seat and is Convenient to toss trash in. I like that the strap can be adjusted and stays put without sliding around. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Robin and won't sit up.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to sit on The floor by The front passenger seat but it wouldn't sit up. I tried Velcro to keep it up against the console but that didn't work. Now I keep it with my grocery bags to use as a not so great cooler. I bought a smaller similar one with a built in hole for trash at the top that works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: cary jennings

customer_reviews.title: Not a durable product
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: After 2 years of use, the strap broke right off, making this product unusable. So disappointing for the amount of money paid. ---------------------------- This is the perfect solution for me because I spend a lot of time in the car. In person, the color looks much lighter grey. Grocery bags fit in here just right, which is what attracted me to this product. The hooks and the shape of the product keep bags secure and in place. The snap does not function - it will not stay closed at all. Overall, I think this product is pricier than other similar models, but it is a good choice if you like to line your trash can with grocery bags.
customer_reviews.author: caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Sturdier than I expected! I like the soft sides, which allow me to fit it in between the front seats of my 2015 Chevy Sonic, resting on the console. This way, I can reach it, but it's not in the way of my front passenger or rear passengers. The strap adjusts so I put it over the parking brake handle. The unit won't slide down and spill. Seems like a perfect size to get me through the day with passengers and lots of activity, but small enough that it won't lend itself to debris accumulating.
customer_reviews.author: MyLikeIt

customer_reviews.title: Decently Sized Trash Bin
customer_reviews.text: Overall I would say this product is decently sized. It’s not really what I would call XL but it does the tricks to fit any kind of plastic store shopping bag after you run out of the plastic bags they supply. This trash bin also has a snap button where you can keep the top part of the lid closed to prevent spillage. It also has 2 side pockets where you can keep extra bags or even air fresheners to keep your car smelling luxurious. It fits snuggly on any headrest and leaves plenty of room for passengers.
customer_reviews.author: Nina B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for whatever you want to carry in it.
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts about this but it wasn't terribly expensive. I mounted this on the back of the drivers seat in my car for trash. It hangs well and stays open. It doesn't hold a huge amount but it holds more than the old style litter bags for your car and it is out of the way. A person could use this though for snacks or anything else that is small and tends to get lost in the car. I'm going to get one for my other car.
customer_reviews.author: Cas

customer_reviews.title: I really Do Love This
customer_reviews.text: This is deserving of a 5 star. I doesnt look like a trash bin and I really liked that I came with some liners that fit perfect. Thinking about buying another for traveling and using as a ice bucket. Or snack holder. The things I can use for this is endless. I have an event coming up and could use it there for keeping my tablets in there or my orders. Or bring drinks. If I wear something comfortable, I may store my weapon in there beside me.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Holder

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Addition to my truck
customer_reviews.text: I hate trash in the floor or worse, the cup holders, so I purchased this small bin for my Ford F150. I put it directly behind the center console on the floor. It is heavy enough to stay on place during regular driving. It also is the right size to use grocery store plastic bags as liners. Well worth the price... to me.
customer_reviews.author: DBD

customer_reviews.title: Good trash can for on the go. Could be improved.
customer_reviews.text: Good sized trash can for a family car. It seems well constructed. My only complaint is that over several months, it has seemed to loose a bit of its shape. When it hangs, the bottom sags so that it’s not box shaped. It might have been better if ridged pannels were sewn into the bottoms and sides. Mine is hanging on the back side of the passenger head rest. It’s a perfect place where I can reach, but my son that sits on that side of the car can also put backseat trash into it too.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a great product. Opted to put it behind my center console, perfect fit and velcro strips are included to hold it in place. Also love that it came with a supply of trash bags and that there are clips on the sides to hold the bags in place. Best car trash container I’ve had.
customer_reviews.author: annie-stazia

customer_reviews.title: Keep your car clean!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to help keep the trash in your car in one place. It fits snuggly on the front passenger side of my Subaru Assent. It is not uncomfortable for the passenger. It's easy to empty and change the bags. It is so much better than the plastic grocery bags I used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: M. K. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Fits behind center console beautifully
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of the old loop a grocery bag around the gear shift method and decided to get a real trash can designed for the inside of a vehicle. This product mounts nicely to the rear of the center console in my 2002 Toyota Tacoma, almost like it was meant to be there. Not much more to say, it's a trash can. But suffice it to say, this is a much better solution than using an old grocery bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Bashaw

customer_reviews.title: My coworkers think its strange how much I like a good garbage bin
customer_reviews.text: Finally a solution to my 6 year old mess maker. I strappec this bin to the side of his car seat and now its so much easier to contain his messes on our long commute and clean up faster when we make it home. My coworkers think its strange how much I like a good garbage bin, but this is more like a sanity saver. No more banana peels on the floor or juice boxes under the seats!
customer_reviews.author: NWMomma

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect little trash can. I was so tired of picking up the trash from my kids. This is perfect!! I have mine hanging off the back of the seat in my truck. There's plenty of leg room and it works very well. I'm really pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kat M.

customer_reviews.title: A little tricky to install but great once you do
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I like how it was designed to go with shopping bags. I got it because my gear shift is a set a little to high for a plastic bag to hang off of. So this could also install to the center console. It was a little tricky at first to get the buckles just right so the center console would close and the bucket wasn't sitting weird or lopsided but it's great and sturdy now
customer_reviews.author: Lizzi

customer_reviews.title: This is not just for trash
customer_reviews.text: I'm the owner of a construction company, the last 44 years my truck is my second office space on wheels. With everything from computers, tools to delicate inspection equipment it can be hard to stay organized. After riding around a few months with garbage bin, I ordered two more. This one hangs behind my seat holding several laser instruments and my gloves. When I open my door the everything I need is right there. Better then on the passenger seat which often ends up on the floor and me walking around my truck looking around for stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Must have for your vehicle!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AWESOME! It fits a regular grocery bag and all of your trash fits. I keep mine on the floor between the back seats and I can easily throw my trash away behind me, but not see it all the time. And there’s a magnetized lid if you want to keep it covered!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice for Keeping Car Clean
customer_reviews.text: This is great for keeping trash under control in the car. With liners (or old shopping bags) the trash can be quickly removed and thrown out. The only problem I have is that I would like to strap it to and behind my center console so it is easily reached from the front seats. Unfortunately the straps are not long enough to reach. However, this is a minor issue that I overcame by adding an "extension" to the straps.
customer_reviews.author: LongHours

customer_reviews.title: Epic fail. Attaches on wrong side.
customer_reviews.text: First, the strap is attached to the wrong side. So when you buckle it to the back of the seat, the cover has to flip towards the seat back to close. Second, it doesn't hold its shape. Third, the lid doesn't stay shut, so everything falls out onto the floor. The only way to get any use out of it is to attach it between the 2 front seats. Even then it's not great.
customer_reviews.author: CinnamonT3

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: I love this trash can, very roomy, not too big or too small, for perfectly behind the seat, came with trash bags and u can choose different color straps.
customer_reviews.author: fai lam

customer_reviews.title: Nice Compact Size and Fits All My Paper Trash
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little trash bag for my 2015 Mustang GT because receipts, extra napkins, and other paper products would always end up under my seat or on the passenger side floor. Now it all goes into this trash bag! It fits great around the passenger seat headrest and is deep enough to fit all CVS receipts and other paper waste that usually end up in my car. It even came with plastic bags to refill it! It has plastic clips on the side to hold the plastic bag in place too.
customer_reviews.author: WatchTheShow

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Car Trash bin
customer_reviews.text: This sturdy trash bin holds it's shape. The hooks to firm attach a bag with handles are nice allowing the bag to stay in place. The bin can double as an insulated cooler although we don't plan on using it for that. Update: After using for a couple of weeks one of the tabs that holds the bag in place has broken. Therefore, I've changed by rating to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Girl

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and helps keep the car neat
customer_reviews.text: This secured easily in our car and provides a convenient means of disposing of trash when in the car. I used the strap to secure mine to the back of the middle console. Now when I have trash I can just drop it into the middle of the backseat, which is super convenient for drive throughs and such. Another neat feature is that after you run out of the included bags, you can use plastic grocery store bags, which you can store in the side pocket. It's a bit expensive compared to the alternatives, but worth it for how much easier it is to keep the car clean.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Well made and helps keep my van clean
customer_reviews.text: Helps keep my car clean. I have 3 kids so that’s hard to do. I drive a Kia mini van. I hooked this to the gear shift and let it hang on the passenger side. This is easy to reach while driving and doesn’t get smashed behind the passenger seat and the baby car seat like it did when I had it hanging from the head rest. Fits tons. I wasn’t planning to buy more trash bags by this brand but I probably will because it’s been so convenient and they fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Designed But Incorrectly Attached Snap
customer_reviews.text: Quality and utility are overall very good. However, the manufacturer incorrectly mounted the closure snap on the inside of the bag making it impossible to snap shut. I fixed it with self-sticking velcro – but the idea of repairing a brand new item just to make it work acceptably rankles!
customer_reviews.author: Barry Barnes

product_meta.title: Car Trash Can and Garbage Bag Set: Leak Proof Trash Container with Lid and Accessories to Keep Your Auto Interior Clean - The Drive Bin As Seen on TV Collective - 1-Pack XL, Black Strap
feature_bullets: The DRIVE Bin As Seen On TV! You're going to absolutely love this Patent Pending best seller from Drive Auto Products. Why? Because we've done all the research on what buyers like or don't like about their automotive wastebasket bins...

The idea of having a versatile container to help keep your vehicle clean and organized is smart. Many who now have one are saying things like "finally a place for my junk" or "helps keep my boat so much cleaner" and "a soft cooler for picnic travel snacks & 6 pack soda cans". But how do you know which one to buy? Easy, the one that checkmarks all the boxes.

...BONUS 20-PACK LINERS: Water Proof 2 Gallon Thermal Rubbish Receptacle for Paper Mess, Fast Food, Empty Cups, Candy Wrappers on Floor Mats & Seat Covers, Reduce Smell w/ Non Messy Disposal for Tidy, Neat, Spick & Span.

...BENEFITS: To keep it clean & odorless we include custom disposable interior plastic bags! And we added a mesh side pouch pocket to store them. Hang this automobile accessory anywhere with the adjustable quick-clip strap! Convenient and user friendly the seat headrest attachment allows for easy access when you need it. Finally, a size that fits - holds big clutter yet compact portable design still allows for useful passenger space.

...FEATURES: Patented Side Clasps to Secure Liners, a Pinning Feature, Hand Sewn Edges & Seams, Less Ripping, Stays Open, or Velcro Closed, Handy Storage Holder for Kids Toys, Color Matches Tan Grey Black Leather or Cloth, All Performance Parts Accessories for Cars, Truck, Boats, SUV, Van, or RV!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,843 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
